槤字的基本解释

槤
lián

槤
liǎn
均见“梿”。

槤字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lián］
［《廣韻》力延切，平仙，來。］
“梿1”的繁体字。
(1)木名。
(2)见“槤枷”。
[②]［liǎn］
［《集韻》力展切，上，來。］
“梿2”的繁体字。
(1)古代祭祀时盛黍稷的器皿。
(2)敛，收拢。

槤字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　槤； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页546第28
【說文】里典切，音璉。瑚槤也。【禮·明堂位】夏后氏四璉，殷六瑚。一說以木爲之，因以爲重器，故又从玉。　又【集韻】力展切，音輦。義同。　又【唐韻】力延切【集韻】陵延切，?音連。【玉篇】簃也。【爾雅·釋宮】連謂之簃。【註】堂樓閣邊小屋。　又横關木。【類篇】門持關謂之槤。　又木名。見栛字註。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lián］
["Guangyun" Li Yanqie, Pingxian, come. ]
Traditional characters for "梿1".
(1) Wooden name.
(2) See "梿枷".
[②]［liǎn］
["Jiyun" strives to cut, go up, come. ]
Traditional characters for "梿2".
(1) A vessel used to hold millet during ancient sacrifices.
(2) Converge and gather.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　梿; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 546 28
[Said Wen] Li Dianqie, Yinlian. Hu Lian also. 【Rite·Ming Hall】The Fourth Lian of Xiahou Family, Yin Liuhu. It is said that wood is used, because it is regarded as a heavy weapon, so it is from jade.　[Jiyun] Extends and cuts hard, and the sound is not. The same meaning.　[Tang Yun] Li Yanqie [Ji Yun] Ling Yanqie,? The sound is connected. [Jade articles] Yan Ye. 【Erya·Shigong】Lianzhizhizhi. [Note] The small house beside the pavilion.　 Heng Guanmu again. 【Classes】The gate is held at the gate of Zhizhi.　Also wooden name. See 栛字Note.
